name: American Truck Simulator: Arizona
summary: The Grand Canyon State welcomes you! Drive through the streets of its largest city and capital, Phoenix, and discover the distinctive southern centers Flagstaff and Tucson. Enjoy the sweeping, ever changing scenery of this corner state - hypnotizing deserts, endless forests, deep canyons and wild mountains. Cross the Colorado river over unique bridges and explore many wonderful vistas and famous landmarks within this region. This is a free add-on.
